name: Guilherme Moneda
headline: I help organizations deliver resilient B2B platforms and scale engineering capabilities.
summary: I combine technical delivery experience, agile coaching, and program leadership to turn complex roadmaps into measurable business outcomes.

projects.title: Built & scaled cloud platform team to support B2B e-commerce
projects.text: Led a 35+ cross-functional organization of DevOps, Solution Architects and Operations Managers to maintain and evolve a cloud & infra platform.
projects.outcome: Improved platform readiness for B2B operations and supported continuous delivery and product growth.

projects.title: Global product stabilization & expansion (BEES)
projects.text: Contributed to QA, automation and release efforts for a B2B product used in 19+ countries and serving millions of users.
projects.outcome: Drove release-quality improvements and four successful country go-lives (Colombia, Ecuador, Argentina, Dominican Republic).

projects.title: Program metricization and cost optimization
projects.text: Defined OKRs and DevOps metrics (team productivity, CI/CD health) and monitored costs monthly to identify optimization opportunities.
projects.outcome: Introduced measurable KPIs and cost-awareness routines to improve delivery predictability and resource allocation.

experience.title: Principal Project Manager
experience.outcome: Managed enterprise delivery streams and aligned program scope with product and leadership goals.

experience.title: Technical Project Manager | Agile Coach
experience.outcome: Built and led teams supporting cloud infra and B2B platforms; implemented OKRs & delivery metrics.

experience.title: Scrum Master
experience.outcome: Accelerated delivery cadence and introduced quality-focused processes for the BEES Rewards product.
